stanza.line: If thy soul check thee that I come so nearnear

And will thy soul knows is admitted therethere
Thus far for love my love-suit sweet fulfilfulfil
Will will fulfil the treasure of thy lovelove
Ay fill it full with wills and my will oneone
In things of great receipt with case we proveprove
Among a number one is reckoned nonenone
Then in the number let me pass untolduntold
Though in thy store account I one must bebe
For nothing hold me so it please thee holdhold
That nothing me a something sweet to theethee
Make but my name thy love and love that stillstill
And then thou lov me for my name is WillWill
